layout.name: width
layout.title: Width
layout.tooltip: How wide the area is, in pixels.

layout.name: height
layout.title: Height
layout.tooltip: How tall the area is, in pixels.

layout.name: restrictCamera
layout.title: Restrict Camera
layout.tooltip: If ticked, the camera will not be able to leave this area while the player is in it.

layout.name: music
layout.title: Music
layout.tooltip: The music played whilst in this section.

layout.name: customMusicPath
layout.title: Custom Music Path
layout.tooltip: Path of the file used if the above option is set to 'Custom'.

layout.name: backgroundName
layout.title: Background Name
layout.tooltip: Name of the background used while in this area. Leave blank for no background. Images come from smwMap/background-X.png.

layout.name: backgroundColor
layout.title: Background Color
layout.tooltip: The color of the background, if the image is not specified.

layout.text: Note: This should be placed in the top left corner of where you want the area to be. The player can also be in multiple areas at once.
